details.question: What is a hackathon?
details.answer: Hackathons are awesome events full of creativity, tech and passionate students collaborating. We work in teams to create apps, games, robots… literally anything you want to build & learn about!

details.question: How much does it cost?
details.answer: GreatUniHack is free for all hackers. We will provide you with swag, cool workshops, a few prizes and… lots of fun!

details.question: What if I don’t have a team?
details.answer: No need to worry! Part of the fun of a hackathon is meeting new people. We will have time at the beginning of the event for everyone to meet and form teams.

details.question: What should I use/bring to this hackathon?
details.answer: Make sure you have got your laptop, chargers, phone for some games and good internet.

details.question: Who can apply?
details.answer: We accept students who are over 18 and are currently studying or have graduated less than 1 year ago. You can also join us as a mentor! Contact us for more info.

details.question: I don’t know how to code. Can I still participate?
details.answer: Hackathons are for beginners. There is an amazing suite of industry experts and mentors that are happy to assist you!

details.question: What can I expect from GreatUniHack?
details.answer: An entire weekend of great company, good entertainment and plenty of swag! We’ll also have a tons of mentors & loads of assistance. This year, we have a nuclear fallout theme with lots of entertainment surrounding this.

details.question: Who owns my IP rights, code and idea?
details.answer: You own all the rights to your intellectual property. We won’t claim any right over anything made during this event.
